what: Insert plots and SVG as inline content into Quarto and R Markdown
title: Insert plots and SVG as inline content into Quarto and R Markdown
text: inlinesvg package makes easy include plots (content) inline SVG elements Quarto R Markdown documents.

title: Insert plots and SVG as inline content into Quarto and R Markdown
text: can install development version inlinesvg GitHub :

title: Insert plots and SVG as inline content into Quarto and R Markdown
text: inline_svg_plot() function allows insertion plots, native plot() ggplot2::ggplot() content, inline SVG within Quarto R Markdown HTML formats, allowing provision ARIA compliant alt text. powered two separate functions: svg_plot() rendering plot inline_svg_file() insert SVG content. svg_plot() provides alternative mechanism saving plots SVG files compared ggplot2::ggsave() turning graphics device base::plot(). inline_svg_file() provides generalised method inserting content SVG files Quarto R Markdown based HTML output.

title: Insert plots and SVG as inline content into Quarto and R Markdown
text: package intended use Quarto R Markdown, specifically HTML output formats . two main methods producing SVG content R: native grDevices::svg() (related Cairo::CairoSVG()) device based Cairo graphics library, svglite::svglite() device. rendering plots Quarto (R Markdown) HTML using vector graphics output SVG better raster output JPEG PNG since vector graphics can scale changes resolution. standard approach including graphics within Quarto R Markdown content, either raw format (e.g. ![alt](file)) via {knitr} cells results SVG content rendered via HTML tag. Using tag results content treated raster-based image format JPEG PNG. web browsers scale SVG content within tag, internal components SVG inaccessible browser engine meaning styled via CSS interacted (e.g. text selected). inlinesvg package provides alternative approach inserting SVG content directly HTML tree document. support alt text added ggplot2, svglite currently support alt text. inline_svg_plot() inline_svg_file() enable incorporation ARIA compliant short long form alt text, <desc> tags.

what: Insert SVG file as inline content — inline_svg_file
title: Insert SVG file as inline content — inline_svg_file
text: Inserts content SVG file inline SVG content, .e. body resulting HTML.

title: Insert SVG file as inline content — inline_svg_file
code: inline_svg_file(   path,   id = NULL,   role = NULL,   alt_title = NULL,   alt_description = NULL,   source_note = NULL,   strip_ns = TRUE,   dimensions = c("preserve", "strip", "replace"),   width = NULL,   height = NULL,   units = NULL )

title: Insert SVG file as inline content — inline_svg_file
text: path Path SVG file id id value SVG element within HTML document (optional) role ARIA role SVG element (optional) alt_title short title assistive technology users (optional) alt_description longer description assistive technology users (optional) source_note Text include containing <div> source reference note image. strip_ns Whether remove XML DTD dimensions Whether 'preserve' dimensions defined SVG tag, 'strip' 'replace' provided values width width SVG element (optional) height height SVG element (optional) units units width height (optional)

title: Insert SVG file as inline content — inline_svg_file
Insert SVG file as inline content — inline_svg_file
text: Quarto R Markdown documents inserting SVG images via standard image markdown (e.g. ![alt_text](img.svg)) HTML tags results SVG rendered image interacted user (e.g. selecting text), can elements modified CSS. inline_svg_file() takes content SVG file inserts inline SVG content within body rendered HTML document. Optionally element id can specified (provided one created), provided overwrite existing 'id' attribute encoded SVG object. source_note can provided included image, class "svg-source-note" styling CSS id starting "svg-source-note-" using supplied generated id. svglite::svglite() encodes width height (points) object

what: Render plots as SVG and insert as inline content — plot
title: Render plots as SVG and insert as inline content — plot
text: wrapper svglite::svglite() saving plots SVG files inserting inline_content.

title: Render plots as SVG and insert as inline content — plot
code: svg_plot(   plot,   path = NULL,   width,   height,   units = c("px", "pt", "cm", "mm", "in"),   overwrite = TRUE,   standalone = TRUE,   ... )  inline_svg_plot(   plot,   path = NULL,   width,   height,   units = c("px", "pt", "cm", "mm", "in"),   overwrite = NULL,   alt_title = NULL,   alt_description = NULL,   source_note = NULL,   id = NULL,   explicit_size = FALSE,   standalone = FALSE,   ... )

title: Render plots as SVG and insert as inline content — plot
text: plot graphics object plot. path file path save SVG plot (optional). width Width output plot. height Height output plot. units Units used width height. overwrite files overwritten (default TRUE) standalone Whether svglite::svglite() omit XML DTD header namespace info (default FALSE). ... Arguments passed svglite::svglite(). alt_title Short alt text include inline SVG (optional). alt_description Long-form alt text include inline SVG (optional). source_note Text include containing <div> source reference note image. id id referencing SVG within HTML/CSS (optional) explicit_size Whether inline <svg> tag explicitly include dimensions plot (default FALSE).

title: Render plots as SVG and insert as inline content — plot
text: svg_plot() wrapper around svglite::svglite() graphics device simplifies use saving plots. Compared svglite::svglite() users need manually active deactivate graphics device, users can also specify width height dimensions inches. inline_svg_plot() combines svg_plot() inline_svg_file() insert plot inline SVG content within Quarto R Markdown document. Unless otherwise specified chart rendered SVG via temporary file, path returned invisibly svg_plot(). re-using plots elsewhere advised use explicit path name use inline_svg_file() re-insert SVG content rather rely temporary path provided svg_plot(). id inline SVG can provided directly accessible via HTML CSS (e.g. linking styling). source_note can used insert text immediately SVG image

title: Render plots as SVG and insert as inline content — plot
text: alt_title alt_description allow insertion alt text SVG content, alt_title intended short descriptions alt_description longer-form descriptions. supplied plot ggplot2::ggplot() object alt text supplied plot object inspected alt text, alt text 150 characters less used alt_title longer used alt_description.
